html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-03822024-04-19PSPC
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Post Corporation Act
PrecisRegulations amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADA POST CORPORATION ACT in order to (1) increase the rate for the letter mail weighing 30g or less to $1.15; (2) increase the rate for a stamp purchased in a booklet, coil or pane to $0.99; (3) increase the rate for other domestic weight steps, and United States and international letter-post items; and (4) increase the fee for domestic registered mail to $10.50.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0067 Publication Date: 2024-05-08
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADA POST CORPORATION ACT in order to (1) increase the rate for the letter mail weighing 30g or less to $1.15; (2) increase the rate for a stamp purchased in a booklet, coil or pane to $0.99; (3) increase the rate for other domestic weight steps, and United States and international letter-post items; and (4) increase the fee for domestic registered mail to $10.50.
